definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Nu 34:3 border, boundary, territory (NH id., Punic gubulim (pl., Plaut:Poen. i. 9)—[[גׇּבוּל]] Ge 10:19 + 168 t. + Jos 15:47 Kt (but rd. Qr [[גׇּדוֹל]]); [[גְּבֻל]] Nu 21:13 + 9 t.; (both, in abs. & cstr., e.g. abs. Nu 22:36, Nu 34:8, cstr. Ge 10:19, 2Sa 21:5); sf. [[גְּבוּלִי]] 1Ch 4:10, [[גְּבוּלְךָ]] Ex 7:27, [[גְבֻלְךָ]] Ex 23:31 + 3 t., etc.; pl. (8 t.) only sf. [[גְּבוּלֶיךָ]] Je 15:13, Je 17:3, etc.;—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of a land or people: Canaanites Ge 10:19 (J), Edom Nu 20:23, Jos 15:1, Jos 15:21 (all P) cf. Ob:Ob 7, Amorites Nu 21:13 (E) Jos 13:4 (D) cf. Jos 12:5 (D) Ju Jdg 1:36, Moab Nu 21:13, Nu 21:15, Nu 22:36 (E) Nu 33:44 (P) De 2:18, Ju Jdg 11:18, Jdg 11:18, 2Ki 3:21, Is 15:8, Ammon Nu 21:24 (E) De 3:16, Jos 12:2, Jos 13:10 (all D) Am 1:3, Bashan Jos 12:4 (D), Egypt 1Ki 5:1 = 2Ch 9:26, Is 19:19; esp. of promised land Ex 23:31, Ex 34:24 (JE) Nu 34:3 + 13 t. Nu 34 (all P) De 11:24, De 12:20, De 16:4, Jos 1:4 (D), cf. Ez Eze 45:1 10 t. Ez Eze 45–Eze 48; also of Israel 2Ki 14:25, Am 6:2, Mal 1:5.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: boundary of smaller divisions, e.g. Geshurites De 3:14, Jos 12:5, Jos 13:11 (all D), cf. Jos 16:2, Jos 16:3 (J) Jos 19:12 (P); esp. of tribes of Israel De 3:16, De 3:17, Jos 13:30 (all D) Jos 13:16 + 60 t. Jos 13–Jos 19 (P);—Jos 15:47 rd. [[גדול]] v. supr.; Jos 22:25 (P) & Jos 17:8, Jos 18:11, Jos 24:30 (JE), cf. 1Ch 6:39, 1Ch 6:51, 2Ch 11:13, Ez Eze 48:1 + 15 t. Ez Eze 48 (incl. v:Eze 22, v:Eze 48:22 q. del. Co);—in 1Sa 13:18 rd. for [[גְּבוּל]], [[הַגֶּבַע]] LXX We Dr. †

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: boundary of territory belonging to an individual,—of field, piece of ground, etc. Ge 23:17 (P) De 19:14, De 27:17, Jos 24:30 (E) = Ju Jdg 2:9, 1Ch 4:10, Pr 15:25, Pr 22:28, Pr 23:10, Ho 5:10. †

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: limit to waters of deep Ps 104:9 cf. Je 5:22. †

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: a concrete object marking limit, (a) barrier in Ezekiel's temple Ez Eze 40:12 (del. LXX SyrVer Co) v:Eze 40:12; (b) border of altar Ez Eze 43:13, Eze 43:17, Eze 43:20; (g) surrounding wall of restored Zion Is 54:12 (so LXX Ew Kn Che; De Brd territory, Di undecided). †

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: territory of a city (or limit of such territory) Nu 35:26, Nu 35:27, Jos 13:26, Ju Jdg 1:18, Jdg 1:18, Jdg 1:18, Ez Eze 47:16, Eze 47:16, Eze 47:17, Eze 47:17 (del. LXX Co) Eze 48:1, Am 6:2. †

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: territory about Ezekiel's temple Ez Eze 43:12. †

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: pl. in like sense (only use of pl.), of land Mic 5:5, Is 60:18 (‖[[ארץ]]) Je 15:13 Je 17:13, of city 1Sa 5:6, 2Ki 15:16, 2Ki 18:8; so Ez Eze 27:4 of Tyre. †

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: fig. territory (region) of darkness Job 38:20; territory of wickedness Mal 1:4 (of Edom); territory of his holiness Ps 78:54 (of Canaan).
